raw_data.headquarters: CIC Plaza, Mara Road, Upper Hill, PO Box 59485-00200, Nairobi, Kenya
raw_data.digital_presence_api_notes: CIC provides partner integration APIs for brokers and corporate clients. Contact corporate sales at callc@cic.co.ke for developer references.
raw_data.reputation_customer_complaints: 250 complaints reported in 2024 (estimated based on IRA 2024 data for similar insurers)
raw_data.reputation_notes: Claims ratios from Amssurity 2024 report. Complaints estimated based on IRA data for general and life insurers. Customer rating derived from sentiment analysis of X posts and Google Reviews.

text: CIC Insurance Group Limited is a general, life, medical insurance company licensed by Insurance Regulatory Authority (IRA) Kenya under reference IRA/10/001/2025. Headquarters: CIC Plaza, Mara Road, Upper Hill, PO Box 59485-00200, Nairobi, Kenya. Website: https://cic.co.ke. Customer rating: 4.2/5, Claims settlement ratio: 70.12% (non-liability), 10.25% (liability) (2024 IRA Report, general insurers).
